| History                 = The Chicken Hawks were a gang that were robbing and assaulting runaways. [[Tyrone Johnson (Earth-616)|Cloak]] and [[Tandy Bowen (Earth-616)|Dagger]] intervened when they saw them assaulted two runaways. During the fight one of them injured Dagger, and an enraged Cloak chased down the rest to punish them for what they did, and got his revenge.{{r|Marvel Graphic Novel: Cloak and Dagger and Power Pack: Shelter from the Storm Vol 1 1}}
